attributes.action: Enable Cheaper Pet Care To Stop All These Animals Bring Abandoned/Mistreated
attributes.additional_details: I’ve Seen Many Animals Abandoned And It’s Awful To Watch. Animals Being Put Down At No Fault Of Their Own Either Mistreated Or Abandoned. They All Deserve Better Lives And I Want To Make It Happen. Please Help Me Give Animals A Better Life.
attributes.background: Enable Cheaper Pet Care IE Vets Bills, Possibly Start Something Similar To The NHS But For Animals To Stop All This Mistreating, Abandoning Them And So We Can Keep Our Fury Friends For Longer With A Happier Life.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:

'Create an NHS for pets funded by monthly payments from pet owners'
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641631
